description: Five Ethiopian migrants were killed Thursday in northern Yemen when the area where they were sleeping, close to the border with Saudi Arabia, was hit by shells.
title: Yemen: 5 Migrants Killed by Shells
title_page: Yemen: 5 Migrants Killed by Shells - The New York Times
text: Five Ethiopian migrants were killed Thursday in northern Yemen when the area where they were sleeping, close to the border with Saudi Arabia, was hit by shells, said a diplomat and aid officials. Parts of the border region have become a violent front in the conflict between a Saudi-led coalition and forces allied with Yemenâ€™s Houthi rebels. The Ethiopians had sought shelter near an aid center in Haradh run by the International Organization for Migration, which has helped evacuate foreigners from Yemen. In a separate attack on Thursday, at least 19 people died when airstrikes by the Saudi-led coalition struck a residential neighborhood in Dhamar, south of Sana, the capital, said an official at a nearby hospital.
